articles.title: Ninja is releasing a new twist on its best-selling CREAMi for 2025. Here's what we know so far
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja is launching a new product called "Swirl" under the CREAMi line. This appliance is an entirely new product and is not an accessory to the existing Ninja CREAMi products. Pricing and availability details will be announced soon.

articles.title: Ninja is releasing a new twist on its best-selling CREAMi for 2025. Here's what we know so far
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Ninja is preparing to launch the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi, a new appliance that blends features of the Ninja CREAMi and Ninja SLUSHi. This machine operates similarly to the traditional CREAMi, but with the added functionality of soft serve dispensing. The release is expected in February, following social media teases.

articles.title: 6 News at 6:00 p.m. for 1/7/2025
articles.author: Trevor King
articles.summary: Starbucks introduces a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter. This suggests the launch of new product offerings related to seasonal beverages or food items.

articles.title: LaCie's new drop-proof drive is fast enough to edit 8K video without lag
articles.author: Hillary K. Grigonis
articles.summary: Seagate has launched the LaCie Rugged SSD Pro5, targeting creative professionals, which it claims is the 'industry's fastest scratch disk'. The drive offers maximum read speeds of up to 6700 MB/s and write speeds of 5300 MB/s, enabled by Thunderbolt 5. The 2TB version is priced at $400, and the 4TB at $600.

articles.title: LaCie's new drop-proof drive is fast enough to edit 8K video without lag
articles.author: Hillary K. Grigonis
articles.summary: Seagate has launched the LaCie Rugged SSD Pro5, targeting creative professionals with its fast read (up to 6700 MB/s) and write (5300MB/s) speeds enabled by Thunderbolt 5. This new SSD is designed for real-time editing of high-resolution footage and can resist drops up to three meters, with the 2TB version priced at $400 and the 4TB at $600.

articles.title: I finally touched the MSI Claw 8 AI Plus.
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Intel launched the Lunar Lake handheld device. Initial impressions suggest improved design and performance compared to its predecessor.

articles.title: 26 Target Products That'll Make Your Home Look So Much Nicer In 2025
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Target is showcasing a range of new home decor and furniture products, including a modular entryway storage piece, a wing arm accent chair, and a set of soft double-brushed sheets. Our Place is promoting their Always Pan 2.0, which features improved nonstick technology.

articles.title: Dyson's popular V8 Absolute vacuum is on sale right now - Save $170
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Absolute vacuum features a digital motor V8 that delivers 115 AW of suction power and provides up to 40 minutes of runtime. It also features a fully sealed filtration system, capturing 99.99% of microscopic particles, and innovative de-tangling technology in its Motorbar cleaner head. The vacuum includes various accessories and a two-year warranty.

articles.title: Amazon Is Letting Advertisers Analyze 5 Years Worth of Consumers' Shopping
articles.author: David Cohen
articles.summary: Amazon Ads announced at CES that brands using Amazon Marketing Cloud can now query up to five years of purchase signals. This expanded history is available in limited beta as part of Amazon Marketing Cloud's Flexible Shopping Insights feature, aiming to boost the fidelity of metrics like customer lifetime value and new-to-brand.

articles.title: At CES 2025, the Hyve Is a New Kind of Outdoor Locker to Fight Porch Pirates
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Hyve Security launched The Hyve at CES 2025, a smart home delivery pod designed to prevent package theft. The Hyve includes features like a carbon fiber tether to secure the box.

articles.title: Dyson's mega-popular Supersonic hair dryer marked down $100
articles.author: Leada Gore
articles.summary: Dyson is offering its Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer for $299.99, a $100 discount. The hair dryer uses Air Multiplier technology for fast drying and features a styling concentrator. It protects hair from heat damage, increasing smoothness by 75%, shine by 132%, and decreasing frizz by 61%.

articles.title: Nomad launches limited edition Dark Icy Blue Sport Band
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nomad has launched a limited-edition Glow in the Dark Icy Blue Sport Band for Apple Watch, featuring a sleek icy blue appearance during the day and a vibrant blue glow at night. DeepSeek introduced an innovative AI-powered image generator that translates images into detailed textual descriptions for the visually impaired. OpenAI released improved Codex models, powerful AI systems designed to generate code in multiple programming languages.

articles.title: Pick up the iRobot Roomba Vacuum at its lowest price ever today on Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: iRobot is offering its Roomba Vac Robot Vacuum at its lowest price ever on Amazon. This robot vacuum cleaner has a 3-stage cleaning system, advanced sensors, smart navigation, and is compatible with voice assistants for hands-free cleaning.

articles.title: What's on show at CES 2025? Robot dogs, AI-powered beauty mirrors among the new gadgets
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled a beauty mirror at CES, equipped with AI to scan and analyze skin for potential issues, recommending products based on perceived needs. L'Oreal introduced a tabletop device with a 'lab-on-a-chip' to analyze skin samples, also offering a personalized skincare approach.

articles.title: What's on show at CES 2025? AI-powered beauty mirrors, robot dogs and more
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled a beauty mirror that uses AI to scan a user's face and analyze skin issues, recommending products based on perceived needs. L'Oreal introduced a tabletop device with a lab-on-a-chip that analyzes skin samples for personalized skincare recommendations.

articles.title: This Robot Vacuum With Task Arm at CES Marks a New Era in Mechanical Cleaning
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roborock introduced a new intelligent robot. The robot vacuums, mops, and tidies up.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 first impressions: Flagship done right
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13, a premium phone featuring a sleek design, a Hasselblad camera system, and a long-lasting battery. The phone boasts a 6.82-inch Quad HD+ ProXDR Display with LTPO 4.1 and is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite. It runs OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15 and is priced starting at Rs 69,999.

articles.title: Freshly Baked Cinnamon Rolls with ‘Morning Rolls'
articles.summary: Starbucks introduces a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: Taste-Off: The best (and worst) pre- and probiotic sodas in local markets
articles.author: Jolene Thym
articles.summary: Supermarkets are now offering sodas made with pre- or probiotics. A taste test was conducted on 11 different brands to determine the most refreshing and flavorful options.

articles.title: How Much Should Consumers Pay For AI?
articles.author: Stephanie Palazzolo
articles.summary: AI firms are adopting diverse pricing strategies for their products. Google's new "Flash" model attracts price-sensitive developers with its low cost.

articles.title: Is the future of charging our phones a world where we just don't charge them at all?
articles.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
articles.summary: Swippitt envisions a service where users can swap phone batteries within seconds using a specialized box.

articles.title: Eureka Unveils J15 Max Ultra with Innovative Transparent Liquid Detection Technology at CES 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Eureka is launching two new robotic vacuum cleaners. The Eureka J15 Max Ultra, unveiled at CES 2025 and available in June 2025 for $1,299, features IntelliView™ AI 2.0 for transparent liquid detection and enhanced corner cleaning. The Eureka J15 Ultra, an entry-level model, will launch in March 2025 for $799.

articles.title: Reddit Launches Trend Tracking, AMA Ads
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit has launched Reddit Pro Trends, a tool within Reddit Pro dashboard enabling businesses to track keywords and phrases in real-time to understand Reddit conversations. Additionally, Reddit is launching AMA ads, available in Reddit Ads Manager, allowing brands to promote their 'Ask Me Anything' chats within the app to boost engagement.

articles.title: Nordstrom has Adidas Samba OG sneakers, Gazelles on sale for as low as $60 — ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Nordstrom is offering a discount on Adidas Samba and Gazelle sneakers. Customers looking to purchase these sneakers are encouraged to act fast to secure a pair at the discounted price.

articles.title: Neusoft Showcases Comprehensive AI-powered Solutions for Intelligent Mobility at CES 2025
articles.author: Neusoft Corporation
articles.summary: Neusoft introduced its OneCoreGo Global In-vehicle Intelligent Mobility Solution 5.0 at an exhibition. The new solution integrates Neusoft's navigation product family, AR features, and ecosystem partners to offer a one-stop, intelligent mobility experience.

articles.title: The Hyve smart delivery pod takes a surprisingly low-tech approach with a focus on simplicity and sustainability
articles.author: Jacob Krol
articles.summary: Hyve announced its debut of a smart home-delivery pod, the Hyve, at CES 2025, which is a vertical package locker designed for placement outside homes. Set to begin shipping in June for $299, the Hyve delivery pod will be available in gray or white and allow users to generate delivery codes via the Hyve app for various retailers and delivery services.

articles.title: Judge Cannon Blocks Release of Jack Smith's Report on Trump Documents…
articles.summary: An apparel company is introducing a new line of high-end baby clothes. They are partnering with an agency to create targeted profiles of wealthy young parents or couples. This will enable them to present advertising for the new product line within partner apps based on these profiles.

articles.title: NVIDIA Just Unveiled a Personal Supercomputer That's a Jump to Light Speed for AI Users
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: NVIDIA announced its new product, DIGITS, a 'desktop supercomputer' aimed at data scientists, AI researchers, and students, and scheduled for release in May. DIGITS provides one petaFLOPS of AI computing performance, with claims suggesting it is 1,000 times as powerful as a laptop for AI tasks. NVIDIA shared initial images of DIGITS during the launch, and registration for notifications regarding availability has opened.

articles.title: Why selling digital products is the perfect side hustle for 2025
articles.author: hostinger
articles.summary: The article highlights the advantages of selling digital products and the strategies involved. It also mentions using Hostinger's AI Website Builder to easily create an online store and suggests marketing strategies like social media promotion, paid ads, and email marketing to accelerate growth and increase sales.

articles.title: Can Saudi's New Milaf Cola Compete with Coca-Cola and Pepsi?
articles.author: Palki Sharma
articles.summary: Saudi Arabia has launched Milaf Cola, a fizzy drink made from dates and marketed as the world's first commercial date-derived cola. Milaf Cola contains no added sugar and aims to offer indulgence without guilt. The product is entering the market to compete with established brands like Coca-Cola and Pepsi.

articles.title: AI's Journey to NOW: S4's Monks and Adobe Take the C Space Stage at CES 2025 to Deliver What's Next
articles.author: Monks
articles.summary: Media.Monks introduces a new brand emphasizing cross-vertical and end-to-end capabilities. This integrated portfolio of services aims to maximize client revenue growth, innovation, and reach. The brand launch reflects a focus on comprehensive solutions for clients.

articles.title: TESTED: 'I was blown away by Hoover's impressive robot vacuum'
articles.summary: Hoover's HG4 Hydro Robot Vacuum Cleaner & Mop is on sale for £249. The device maps rooms, vacuums, and mops, offering a convenient cleaning solution. The accompanying app allows users to control the robot and set no-go zones, though some aspects of the app could be simplified. Hoover also sells HG4 at £179.

articles.title: The OnePlus 13 is so waterproof, you can put it in a dishwasher
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones. The OnePlus 13 features IP69 water resistance, a triple 50-megapixel camera system, and a starting price of $899.99. The OnePlus 13R starts at $599.99 and offers a triple camera array with a telephoto lens, and IP65 water resistance. Both phones are available for purchase or pre-order through the OnePlus website, Amazon, and Best Buy.

articles.title: Lenovo's new Android tablet looks like a great iPad Air alternative
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced its new Android-based tablet lineup at CES 2025, including the Yoga Tab Plus, Lenovo Idea Tab Pro, and Lenovo Tab, designed to compete with Apple's iPad. The Yoga Tab Plus features on-device AI powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip and a 12.7-inch 3K anti-reflection PureSight Pro display.

articles.title: Krispy Kreme, Kellanova collaborate for donut collection
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Pop-Tarts is offering new, limited-time donut flavors. This constitutes the introduction of a new, flavored product line.

articles.title: Is your phone listening to you? Yeah, but probably not to target ads.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Apple settled a lawsuit regarding Siri recording conversations. Users can now control if audio snippets from their Siri interactions can be reviewed to improve Siri and dictation. This feature can be found in the privacy settings of Apple devices under Analytics & Improvements.

articles.title: A Textbook Flagship Device
articles.author: Et Online
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13, featuring a 6.8' Pro XDR OLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. The new smartphone is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite and features a 50MP triple-camera system developed with Hasselblad. OnePlus 13 comes with Android 15, AI tools and 100W fast charging.

articles.title: CES 2025: Lenovo unveils its unrollable laptop, why ?
articles.author: Teilor Stone
articles.summary: Lenovo unveiled the ThinkBook Plus Gen6 at CES 2025, a laptop featuring a rollable screen that expands the display area for enhanced productivity. This innovative design aims to improve multitasking and user experience, building upon previous concepts like the Lenovo Yoga Book 9i.

articles.title: Amazon just took $150 off the Moto G Stylus 5G price
articles.author: Mashable
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto G Stylus 5G is available on Amazon for $249.99, offering a 38% discount of $150. This smartphone features a built-in stylus, a pOLED screen, and a 50MP camera.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Review: The Best $899 You Can Spend On A Phone
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its 2025 flagship, the OnePlus 13, featuring a new design, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, an upgraded camera system, and a 6,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging. The OnePlus 13 also introduces a magnetic accessory system and is priced starting at $899 in the USA and ₹69,999 in India.

articles.title: The OnePlus 13 is so waterproof, you can put it in a dishwasher
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus 13 series of phones. The new phones will include an exclusive feature not available on other devices. This feature aims to enhance the cleanliness.

articles.title: Lenovo announces the Yoga Slim 9i, the first Windows laptop with a camera hidden under the display panel, coming in February and starting at $1,849 (Andrew Romero/9to5Google)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching the Yoga Slim 9i, the first Windows laptop featuring a hidden camera under the display panel. The laptop is expected to be available in February, with a starting price of $1,849.

articles.title: Aldi is relaunching sold-out dupe of posh skincare Victoria Beckham & Hailey Bieber love within days & it's £40 cheaper
articles.author: Rhiannon Oliver
articles.summary: Aldi is relaunching its Lacura skincare range on January 26th, featuring dupes of high-end products. The range includes the Hydrating Gel Serum (£4.99), a dupe for Elemis' Superfood CICA Calm Hydration Juice, and the Illuminating Primer Moisturiser (£4.99), similar to Elemis' Superfood Glow Priming Moisturiser. The Lacura Moisturising Cream (£3.99) also makes a comeback.

articles.title: OnePlus 13R launched in India with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset and 6000 mAh battery, ...
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus R in India. The new device features a Snapdragon Gen chipset and a mAh battery.

articles.title: Aurzen Announces World's First Tri-Fold Truly Portable Projector ZIP at CES 2025
articles.author: Aurzen Official
articles.summary: Aurzen is launching its new product ZIP, a tri-fold, truly portable projector, at CES 2025. ZIP features an 8mm HD optical engine, dual aluminum hinges, built-in stereo speakers, a built-in battery, and an anti-slip base.

articles.title: Sugar Scrub Making Class with Alegna Soap Co. at Sannino Vineyard
articles.author: Sannino Vineyard
articles.summary: Alegna Soap Co. is launching a sugar scrub making class at Sannino Vineyard. Participants will create a 9 oz sugar scrub using grape seed oil, fragrances like Merlot and Chardonnay, essential oils, and grape seeds. The class will guide attendees in crafting scrubs tailored to their skin types.

articles.title: The OnePlus 13 has arrived, and it can survive more than a plunge
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: OnePlus launched a new flagship phone. The phone features advanced water resistance, powerful specifications, and a new blue finish.

articles.title: Lenovo's Yoga Slim 9i is the first laptop to get an under-display camera
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced the Yoga Slim 9i laptop. The Yoga Slim 9i features a 32-megapixel under-display camera.

articles.title: 2025 Triangle St. Jude Dream Home Giveaway Groundbreaking Ceremony
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Starbucks is introducing a new menu to help customers warm up during the winter season.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 review: finally, a flagship that can hang
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13, a flagship phone priced starting at $899. It features a new Dual Exposure Algorithm in the camera, improved water resistance, and longer software support. The phone boasts class-leading battery life due to its 6,000mAh cell and supports 80W charging with the included charger and 50W wireless charging.

articles.title: Realbotix Unveils New Robotic Technology At CES 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Realbotix Corp. has introduced Melody, a new open-source humanoid robot, at CES 2025. Melody features upgraded Dynamixel servo motors, modular body parts, and advanced vision systems, enhancing movement fluidity and user interaction. Its open-source platform is compatible with Realbotix's AI or third-party AIs like ChatGPT.

articles.title: LG's new smart speaker has heart eyes.
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: LG showcased the LG On-Device AI Hub at CES, a smart speaker with a 4-inch screen, built-in camera, and microphone. It is designed as a satellite to the ThinQ ON home hub and is currently a concept product without a confirmed release date or price.

articles.title: SanDisk's MagSafe SSD piggybacks an extra 2TB of storage on your iPhone.
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: SanDisk launched the Creator Phone SSD, a magnetically attached external storage solution for smartphones. The SSD offers read speeds up to 1,000MB/s and write speeds up to 950MB/s. This enables ProRes 4K recording at 60fps on iPhone 15 and 16.

articles.title: Smartphone achieves Guinness fame with record-breaking drop test
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines launched its new X9c 5G smartphone on January 10, emphasizing its durability through a live demonstration recognized by Guinness World Records. The smartphone features an all-angle triple defense, achieving an SGS 5-Star rating for Drop Resistance and an IP65M rating for water resistance.

articles.title: I found my favorite CES 2025 gadget — Lenovo's first rollable laptop just stole the show with a screen that grows 50% on command
articles.author: Mark Spoonauer
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching the ThinkBook Plus Gen 6, a rollable laptop with a 120Hz OLED display that expands from 14 to 16.7 inches. Powered by an Intel Core Ultra 7 processor with up to 32GB of RAM and a 1TB SSD, it includes AI tools like Lenovo AI Now and CoPilot+. Available by the end of Q12 2025, it is priced at $3,499.

articles.title: UGREEN to Showcase Pioneering NASync AI NAS Lineup and More at CES 2025
articles.author: UGREEN GROUP LIMITED
articles.summary: UGREEN will showcase its latest innovations at CES 2025, highlighting the unveiling of the NASync iDX6011 and NASync iDX6011 Pro devices. The company will also present the Nexode 500W 6-Port GaN Desktop Fast Charger and the Revodok Max 2131 Thunderbolt™ 5 Docking Station.

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy S25 and AI Enhancements
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 at its Unpacked event on January 22nd, highlighting the next generation of Galaxy AI. The company is offering pre-order incentives, including credits and trade-in deals, to encourage early adoption of the new device. The Galaxy S25 is expected to feature upgrades in processing power, camera technology and battery life.

articles.title: LG showcases future of AI-powered customer experiences
articles.summary: LG Electronics unveiled its AI-powered vision, highlighting its AI agent, LG Furon, and strategic partnership with Microsoft to develop empathetic AI integrated services. The company introduced initiatives like the LG Smart Cottage, a compact modular home integrating AI-powered appliances, and software-defined vehicle solutions, aimed at enhancing user experience across various sectors.

articles.title: 'I have so many pairs' - the £48 Next 'Slim and Shape' design fans call the 'best jeans ever'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next is offering new jeans available in three colors and a wide range of sizes, from 8S petite to 18 XXL tall. These £48 jeans are designed with a slimming fit, five pockets, and a curved waistband, and are made with LYCRA EcoMade elastane for comfort and shape.

articles.title: This Handheld Spin Brush Is A 'Game Changer In Cleaning' — And It's Over Half Off Today
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a handheld electric spin scrubber, known for its cleaning power and efficiency, at a discounted price for Amazon Prime members. The scrubber features multiple attachments, two speeds, and a rechargeable battery, and is waterproof.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil AI-powered Galaxy S25 on Jan. 22
articles.author: Yonhap
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host Galaxy Unpacked in San Jose on January 22, unveiling the Galaxy S25 series smartphones with advanced AI features. The lineup includes a new slim model featuring the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series. The event will be livestreamed on YouTube and Samsung's website.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra: Samsung Confirms January 22 Unpacked Event with New Features
articles.author: Maria
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025. The Galaxy S25 Ultra is expected to feature advanced AI capabilities, an upgraded camera system with a 200 MP main sensor, enhanced battery life and charging speed, and expanded storage options. Pre-orders will open on January 24, with a global release date set for February 7, 2025.

articles.title: John Cena Introduces New McDonald's McValue Menu
articles.author: Screencrush Staff
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new menu. The details of the new menu are not specified.

articles.title: NYT Mini Crossword clues and answers for Tuesday, January 7: A quick brain teaser guide
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: The New York Times offers the NYT Mini Crossword, a concise puzzle available on the NYT Games app or website. The Mini Crossword focuses on brevity and accessibility, offering a quick mental exercise with a balance between cleverness and directness, increasing in difficulty throughout the week. The NYT Games app provides in-game hints and notifications for new puzzles.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce Now set to get a lot better on Steam Deck – and that's great news for playing AAA games on Valve's handheld
articles.author: Isaiah Williams
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching a native GeForce Now app for the Steam Deck later this year, expanding support to other devices like Apple Vision Pro and Meta Quest. This will allow Steam Deck users to stream AAA games with features such as ray tracing at 4K resolution and 60 frames per second, along with DLSS 3 and Nvidia Reflex, providing improved graphical fidelity and performance.

articles.title: Digi International Drives Digital Transformation with the Launch of Digi X-ON™
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Digi International has launched Digi X-ON, an edge-to-cloud IoT solution integrating hardware, software, and cloud connectivity. This platform aims to simplify the deployment and scaling of industrial IoT systems across various applications, including connected cities, smart utilities, industrial IoT, and smart agriculture. The company reports seeing results such as greater visibility into livestock health, automation in buildings, and digital transformation in supply chain use cases.

articles.title: Samsung teases 'next big' mobile launch but we can't ignore these Galaxy S24 deals
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its next Galaxy S series at the Unpacked event on January 22, featuring advanced AI capabilities. The new Galaxy S series (expected to be the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra) aims to set a new standard for mobile AI experiences.

articles.title: Digi International Drives Digital Transformation with the Launch of Digi X-ON™
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Digi International has launched Digi X-ON, an edge-to-cloud IoT solution. Digi X-ON provides the components needed for IoT systems.

articles.title: Marketers: Why are we still so obsessed with creating new content?
articles.author: Kishore Kothandaraman
articles.summary: Goldcast's Content Lab allows users to transform video content into various formats like blogs and social posts, while maintaining a consistent brand voice. HubSpot has released Content Remix, a software designed to repurpose top-performing content into new assets. Other tools mentioned, like Jasper and Repurpose.io, automate content repurposing efforts, offering features like content rewriting and video resizing for different platforms.

articles.title: THESE easy tips will free up Gmail storage efficiently
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Google addresses storage limitations in services like Gmail and Drive by suggesting methods to free up space. Alternatively, users can subscribe to Google One for expanded storage options, including plans for 30GB, 100GB, or 200GB per month, to improve their storage needs.

articles.title: Women reveal handbag necessities for post-date 'shacking' sleepovers... from birth control to makeup wipes
articles.author: MARGARET ABRAMS
articles.summary: Content creator Maddie Smiley shared 'shacking pro tip', which are must-haves when she thinks she could have an impromptu slumber party after a date. Commenters recommended products like Neutrogena makeup wipes, Ursa Major sustainable skincare, Aquaphor or Vaseline.

articles.title: Beauty fans race to buy £2.99 ‘handbag essential' lip balm that's ‘identical' to Clinique Black Honey & £21 cheaper
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Nivea has a lip balm called Cherry Shine Lip Balm that beauty lovers say is almost identical to Clinique's Black Honey Almost Lipstick. Nivea's Cherry Shine Lip Balm is priced at £2.99 which is £21.51 cheaper than Clinique's Black Honey and is available to order online or pick up from Boots.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: You can now pre-reserve Samsung Galaxy S25 series in India
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series (Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra) on January 22 in San Jose, US, with Galaxy AI features expected on the Ultra model. Pre-reservations have begun in India, offering benefits worth Rs. 5000 for a token amount of Rs. 1999, which will be adjusted against the final purchase price.

articles.title: North Lancashire food ingredients firm launches two new divisions
articles.author: Tom Willcox
articles.summary: Innovative Food Ingredients is expanding its business with the launch of two new divisions: The Butchers' Collective, a free members portal providing trade support and resources for butchers, and Taste Creation, an online platform targeted at food manufacturers and retailers offering customized food product development services. These new units are in response to the growing foodie market and demand for diverse flavors, offering resources like webinars, flavor trends, and product development assistance.

articles.title: Synchronoss Launches Enhanced Version of Personal Cloud Solution at CES 2025 Purpose-Built for ...
articles.author: Synchronoss Technologies
articles.summary: Synchronoss Technologies launched the next-generation Synchronoss Personal Cloud™ platform at CES 2025. The platform is available through AT&T, Verizon, SoftBank, and other carriers, enabling users to store and backup digital files. The solution supports over 11 million subscribers and manages 230 petabytes of storage.

articles.title: How AI Customization is Transforming Brand Identity
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: Dreamina offers AI customization tools that revolutionize company branding, making it simpler to create a recognizable and polished brand across platforms. Features like AI inpaint, AI retouch, AI expand, AI blender, and AI text effects allow businesses to modify, enhance, and expand designs, ensuring consistency and quality while saving time and costs.

articles.title: "Open the Dishwasher Door, HAL." Why Does Imitative AI Need to Be In Everything?
articles.author: angryea
articles.summary: Appliance manufacturers are exploring adding imitative AI to their products. Potential AI implementations include fridges suggesting recipes based on available ingredients, stoves recommending cooking settings based on dish photos, and washing machines identifying clothes that need delicate washing. These features are considered attempts to genuinely make appliances more useful, though concerns arise regarding the accuracy and necessity of AI in these applications.

articles.title: Cents Launches Cents Assist, the First AI-Powered Call Center Built for Laundry Businesses
articles.author: Cents
articles.summary: Cents, a business management platform, launched Cents Assist, a new AI-powered customer service solution. This service is designed exclusively for laundry businesses to improve customer communications and order management by combining AI with human expertise.

articles.title: The best beauty buys of January 2025, according to a beauty editor
articles.author: Aaliyah Harry
articles.summary: Several beauty companies have launched new products. Fenty Skin introduced Cherry Dub Pore Purify'R Gel Cleanser. Maybelline launched Super Fluff Brow Mousse. Haus Labs released B Structural Volumising And Lengthening Mascara, Huda Beauty launched Easy Bake Loose Baking & Setting Powder Ube Birthday Cake, and Paula's Choice launched Pro-Collagen Peptide Plumping Moisturiser.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy smartphones at unpacked event on Jan. 22
articles.author: Ahn Sung-mi
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil new Galaxy smartphones, including the Galaxy S25 series with a new slim model, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose, California. The new Galaxy S series is expected to showcase upgraded AI features, including AI voice recognition. The Slim model, potentially the thinnest in the Galaxy S series, is expected to launch in the second quarter.

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked set to take place on January 22
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung is scheduled to hold its Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose, California. During the event, the company will introduce the new Galaxy S series with the next evolution of Galaxy AI. The event will be streamed live on various online platforms.

articles.title: Vegan cheese brand Julienne Bruno unveils ‘world first' Mozzafiore Pearls
articles.author: Kevin White
articles.summary: Julienne Bruno has launched Mozzafiore Pearls, a plant-based alternative to mozzarella pearls, made from soya and coconut oil using traditional cheesemaking techniques. Available exclusively at Whole Foods Market UK stores from January 9, this product represents the first line from Julienne Bruno's Collection 02, expanding on their existing plant-based cheese alternatives.

articles.title: Buy @TitanEdgeXLGummies – From Official Website (Up to 75% Off) Does It Really Work?
articles.summary: @TitanEdgeXLGummies are available for purchase on their official website with a promotional offer of up to 75% off. This suggests a new product launch or significant marketing push for the gummies.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. and MAISON DELAROM Team Up to Redefine Premium Skincare with Advanced AI at Maison & Objet 2025 in Paris
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. collaborates with MAISON DELAROM to launch Perfect Corp.'s Skincare Pro for iPad, an AI-powered solution for skin analysis. MAISON DELAROM will unveil the product at the Maison & Objet trade show in January 2025 and subsequently make it available at its Paris showroom starting February 1, 2025.

articles.title: These headphones don't play music in your ears, they clean them
articles.summary: A company (unnamed in the article) introduces a new over-the-ear cleaner. This device, resembling headphones, utilizes small cameras and sensors. It connects to a smartphone app, enabling users to clean their ears by visualizing the interior.

articles.title: Product Genius AI Guarantees $15K Annual ROI for Businesses
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Product Genius has launched an AI-powered customer engagement platform. The platform guarantees a $15,000 ROI within one year, or a refund will be issued. This platform aims to simplify operations, resolve customer issues in real-time, and boost revenue.

articles.title: CES 2025: What lies ahead in tech this year
articles.author: Shouvik Das
articles.summary: LG showcased the StanByMe TV, which runs on battery and fits inside a briefcase. Samsung and LG introduced AI TVs with generative AI features. Wonder showcased Petal, a camera which uses visual AI models to recognize flowers, birds and insects. Acer showcased the Nitro Blaze 11, a handheld gaming console.

articles.title: How to save favorites on Meesho? Follow these steps
articles.summary: Meesho app allows users to browse products and categories. Users can utilize the search bar or explore sections for inspiration. Tapping on a product reveals details such as price, description, and pictures, aiding purchase decisions.

articles.title: Xbox Prime console rumours shut down by Microsoft insider
articles.author: Jake
articles.summary: Microsoft is exploring handheld console possibilities with an Xbox handheld prototype, though it's still years away from release. Jason Ronald, VP of Xbox Gaming Devices, attended a 'Lenovo Legion x AMD' event. Xbox is also emphasizing its Game Pass service as a core strategy.

articles.title: Motorola launches Moto G05 entry segment phone with Android 15
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G05, featuring a 6.67-inch display, MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage expandable to 1TB, a 50MP rear camera, and an 8MP front camera. Priced at ₹6,999, the Moto G05 will be available in Forest Green and Plum Red, starting January 13 on Flipkart, Motorola's website, and retail stores.

articles.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and more Xbox Game Pass Ultimate titles will soon ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Microsoft partners with LG Electronics to integrate the Xbox App on select LG Smart TVs. This collaboration introduces the Xbox App, expanding its availability to LG Smart TV users.

articles.title: How To Reach People At The Right Time With Personalization Strategies
articles.author: Serenity Gibbons
articles.summary: GENESISX, a consumer engagement platform, utilizes AI to help CPG clients like Kellogg's, Unilever, and Starbucks hyper-target consumers. OptinMonster, a conversion optimization tool, suggests displaying products based on location to boost sales, while Nuance AI Solutions provides patient portal solutions for healthcare, enabling personalized access. Spotify and Canva allow customers to personalize their experiences through custom radio stations and design options, respectively.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to unpack new Galaxy model in U.S.
articles.author: 회계사가 남긴 모든 것
articles.summary: Samsung will host its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22 in San Jose, California, where the company is expected to reveal the Galaxy S25 series, including a new, thinner model called the Galaxy S25 Slim. The event will also showcase enhanced AI functionality in the new devices, indicated by the tagline 'The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences' and the Galaxy AI logo.

articles.title: Five key practical AI applications that are transforming modern business
articles.author: elsie
articles.summary: DialogSphere and Raizor are leveraging AI, supported by Dubai Silicon Oasis (DSO) and its initiatives like the AI cluster and AI for Business Institute. The Rochester Institute for Technology in Dubai launched an AI citizenship initiative, while the Oraseya Capital fund provides financial support, facilitating the development and integration of new AI technologies and services in businesses.

articles.title: Thai Nguyen's provincial-level e-commerce booth makes debut
articles.author: Vietnam
articles.summary: Thai Nguyen province launched an online booth on Shopee platform on January 7 to sell local products and signed a cooperation agreement with Shopee Vietnam Co., Ltd. The booth aims to facilitate online buying and selling of Thai Nguyen products, with 3,000 discount vouchers being offered to encourage sales. Thai Nguyen plans to export its products internationally through e-commerce platforms by 2025, starting with the ASEAN market.

articles.title: Dozens of people rescued from floods in the UK
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: AutoWP introduces a WordPress plugin designed to streamline content creation using AI, offering features to repurpose existing content and generate original articles with SEO-friendly titles and tags. This AI-powered tool aims to save time and improve content quality for website owners and bloggers. AutoWP also optimizes content for search engines.

articles.title: Aldi's Dry January boost as supermarket adds 79p cocktails to alcohol-free range
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new Greyson's 0% alcohol canned cocktails in London Dry and Tonic, and Pink Berries and Lemonade flavors, priced at 79p each. The supermarket has also brought back several of its popular no and low alcohol beverages, including Zerozecco Rosé and Rheinbacher 0% Pilsner, to cater to the Dry January trend.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Series India Launch Today: Expected Price, Specifications, How To Watch Live
articles.author: ETV Bharat Tech Team
articles.summary: OnePlus India is launching the OnePlus 13 series and OnePlus Buds Pro 3 at the Winter Launch Event. The OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a Hasselblad-powered triple rear camera, and a 6,000mAh battery, while the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 introduces AI Translation and comes in a Sapphire Blue colorway.

articles.title: Samsung Begins Pre-Reservations for Next Galaxy S Series in India
articles.summary: Samsung has launched pre-reservations in India for its upcoming Galaxy S series smartphones, allowing customers to reserve their device for a token amount of INR 2000. Pre-reserved customers will have early access and receive benefits of up to INR 5000 upon purchasing the devices. The official unveiling of the Galaxy S series will occur at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025, in San Jose, California.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25: The Next AI Mobile Revolution
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil its new Galaxy S25 series smartphones with advanced AI features at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose on January 22nd. The event will showcase a new, slimmer Galaxy S series model. Samsung also aims to increase the sales of its new foldable smartphones by more than 10% with added AI capabilities.

articles.title: Tesco recognise innovation and quality at Village Bakery
articles.author: Claire Pierce
articles.summary: Jones Village Bakery launched a new range of sourdough bread sold at Tesco. They received an award from Tesco for 'Outstanding Innovation and Quality' for their new bakery products. This recognition highlights Jones Village Bakery's investment in their NPD team and the commercial success of their products.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch: Date, features, details of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will host its Galaxy Unpacked launch event on January 22, 2025, in San Jose, California, to unveil the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. The new phones will feature enhanced AI capabilities, potentially Snapdragon 8 Elite processors, upgraded cameras, faster charging, and Qi2 wireless charging support. Pre-orders will begin on January 24, with the phones going on sale on February 7, 2025.

articles.title: Review: This robot vacuum has an amazing new feature
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the L40 Ultra, a premium robot vacuum cleaner with a clever extendable brush system and a base station that washes and dries the mop heads. The L40 Ultra features 11,000Pa of suction, LiDAR navigation, obstacle avoidance, and a voice command system with a price of £999.

articles.title: Samsung to hold unpack event for new Galaxy smartphone in U.S. this month
articles.author: 김나영
articles.summary: Samsung will hold its Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose on January 22nd to unveil the new Galaxy S series smartphones with advanced AI features. The lineup is expected to include a new slim model with the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series. The event will be livestreamed on YouTube and the company's website.

articles.title: Review: This robot vacuum has an amazing new feature
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the L40 Ultra robot vacuum cleaner, featuring 11,000Pa of suction power and extendable brushes and mops. This new model aims to improve cleaning performance, particularly in corners and on carpets, and includes a roller brush designed to cut up pet fur. The Dreame L40 Ultra price is £999.

articles.title: Global Kartel Unveils AI-Powered Platform Revolutionizing Youth Marketing
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Global Kartel is launching an AI-enhanced Martech platform aimed at revolutionizing youth marketing in India. The new platform uses advanced AI technology to refine marketing strategies for brands connecting with young audiences. This launch represents the next stage of growth for Global Kartel.

articles.title: Global Kartel Redefines Youth Marketing in India with Upcoming Launch of Martech AI-Enabled Platform for Brands
articles.summary: Global Kartel is launching a new Martech AI-enabled platform designed to transform youth marketing. This platform will leverage AI technology to enhance marketing strategies, offering brands a more efficient way to connect with younger audiences. It will provide brands with advanced tools to personalize, automate, and optimize their campaigns.

articles.title: Johnson & Sons Contracting Dumpster Rental. United States,Illinois,Springfield, Waste Management Company
articles.author: Scrap Monster
articles.summary: Johnson & Sons Contracting offers Dumpster Rental services. This service appears to be a core offering from the company in the contracting business.

articles.title: Samsung Announces Galaxy Unpacked 2025, Pre-orders Open January 23
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, with pre-orders starting January 23rd in Indonesia. The new series is expected to include the Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, potentially powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The event will focus on showcasing AI innovations and the new One UI 7 software based on Android 15, offering features like the 'Now Bar' for quick access to information.

articles.title: NVIDIA Release New RTX 50 Series GPU's
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: NVIDIA introduced the RTX 50 Series GPUs, starting with the RTX 5070, at CES 2025. The RTX 50 Series GPUs are designed to offer performance and efficiency advancements for gamers, creators, and professionals.

articles.title: Can AI assistants make TVs better? Samsung thinks so
articles.author: The Star
articles.summary: Samsung is expanding its use of AI in televisions. The company appears to be implementing AI-powered features in TVs, following a trend seen in smartphones, cars, and robot lawn mowers.

articles.title: Samsung Teases 'True AI Companion' Debuting on January 22 Alongside New Galaxy Smartphones
articles.author: Juli Clover
articles.summary: Samsung plans to introduce the next evolution of Galaxy AI, aiming to redefine mobile AI experiences. The new AI features will include converting sketches into images and enhanced translation and composition functionalities within the Notes app. Samsung first showed off Galaxy AI when it introduced the Galaxy ZFold6 and the ZFlip6

articles.title: Moto g05 Launch: Revolutionizing Budget Smartphones
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g05, an entry-level smartphone priced at Rs. 6,999, featuring a 6.67'' display, dual stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos, and a 50MP camera. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme processor and a 5200mAh battery, the moto g05 will be available on Flipkart and retail stores from January 13, 2025.

articles.title: CES 2025: Tineco Set to Transform Home Cleaning with Innovative New Products
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching its new flagship product, the FLOOR ONE S9 Artist Steam, at CES 2025. This innovative floor mop features high-temperature steam cleaning, intelligent capabilities such as Aurora AI lights and iLoop Smart Sensor technology, and a long runtime of up to 75 minutes.  Additionally, Tineco's 2024 flagship models are on display at CES 2025.

articles.title: End-to-end API testing with Arazzo, TypeScript, and Deno
articles.summary: Arazzo, a new specification, is introduced to bridge the gap between API reference documentation and real-world usage patterns.  It generates end-to-end test suites, validating complete user workflows instead of isolated endpoints. This ensures that entire processes work as expected, mimicking real user interactions with an API.

articles.title: ⚡Know Price, Specs, Features of Moto G05 Launched Under INR 10,000
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G05 in India for under INR 10,000. The new smartphone features a premium vegan leather design and a large 5,200mAh battery. Detailed specifications and features are also available.

articles.title: Sambo launches Tobacco Trade Secrets book
articles.author: GRACIOUS DANIEL
articles.summary: Takudzwa Sambo launched "Tobacco Trade Secrets," a book for African tobacco exporters. Sambo also launched "Modern Leaf AI," an AI platform designed to support tobacco farmers and exporters. The application is available for download in Zimbabwe on the App Store and Google Play Store.

articles.title: Samsung to launch new Galaxy smartphones with advanced AI
articles.author: The Siasat Daily
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host its Galaxy Unpacked event in the United States this month. The company plans to unveil its new Galaxy S series smartphones featuring advanced artificial intelligence.

articles.title: CES 2025: Tineco sets new trends with innovations for smart floor cleaning
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching the FLOOR ONE S9 Artist Steam, a new flagship floor care appliance, at CES 2025. The FLOOR ONE S9 Artist Steam utilizes high-temperature steam, Aurora AI Lights, iLoop Smart Sensor technology, and boasts a long service life with self-cleaning functions, designed for efficient and thorough home cleaning.

articles.title: Motorola launches Moto G05 in India, price starts at Rs 6,999
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G05, a new entry-level smartphone, in India for Rs 6,999. It features a 6.67-inch display, Android 15, a 50-megapixel camera, and a 5200mAh battery, and will be available on Flipkart and Motorola.in starting January 13, 2025.

articles.title: Motorola Launches moto g05 With Segments Brightest Display, Vegan Leather Design, & Android™ 15, at Just Rs6,999
articles.summary: Motorola India announced the launch of the moto g05, an entry-level 4G smartphone featuring a 6.67" 1000nits display, dual stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos, and Android™ 15.  The moto g05 will be available in Forest Green and Plum Red starting January 13th, 2025, priced at Rs. 6,999 for the 4GB RAM + 64GB storage variant.

articles.title: AccuTraderBot Review-{AccuTraderPlus Login}-From Zero to Pro: How AccuTraderPlus Simplifies Trading for Everyone ?
articles.summary: AccuTraderPlus is a new trading platform designed to revolutionize the trading experience with its customizable interface, real-time market insights, and advanced portfolio management tools. The platform offers features like risk management tools, automated trading strategies, and seamless integration with third-party services, catering to both new and experienced traders. AccuTraderPlus aims to provide users with the tools and insights needed to optimize their trading strategies and achieve their financial goals.

articles.title: MINI Countryman, MINI brand's sport utility vehicle (SUV) model, continues to be highly popular in t..
articles.author: Kim Dong Eun...
articles.summary: MINI launched the third-generation 'New MINI Countryman' SUV in Korea in June of last year. The new model features increased body and interior space, a circular OLED display in collaboration with Samsung Display, and advanced driver assistance systems. It is available in two engine specifications, the MINI Countryman S ALL4 and the high-performance MINI JCW Countryman ALL4, with prices ranging from 49.9 million to 67 million won.

articles.title: Nvidia's AI NPCs are no longer chatbots ' they're your new PUBG teammate
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Nvidia's AI NPCs have evolved from chatbots to potential teammates within the PUBG gaming environment. This represents a new integration or feature for Nvidia's AI technology within the PUBG platform.

articles.title: Alienware's flagship desktop finally ditches proprietary parts
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Alienware has updated its flagship desktop. The updated desktop now ditches proprietary parts.

articles.title: Nvidia is bringing a native GeForce Now app to Steam Deck
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Nvidia is launching a native GeForce Now app for Steam Deck users. This new application provides users with native access to Nvidia's cloud gaming service on the Steam Deck platform.

articles.title: Nvidia is bringing a native GeForce Now app to Steam Deck
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Nvidia plans to release a native GeForce Now app for Steam Deck later this year. This update aims to improve the cloud gaming service's accessibility and user experience on the Steam Deck platform.

articles.title: Honor Targets Upper-Middle Segment in Indonesia with Innovative Products and Ecosystem
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Honor is re-entering the Indonesian market, planning to launch a range of products including smartphones, tablets, computers and wearables. The company will focus on AI integration, aiming to deliver enhanced photography, real-time translation, and personalized experiences. They plan to introduce AI-driven folding screen technology which they claim is the thinnest on the market.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event Set For January 22: Pre-reservations Open For Galaxy S25 Series
articles.author: ETV Bharat Tech Team
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22, 2025, in San Jose, California. The new series is expected to include the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra. Additionally, Samsung may introduce its extended reality (XR) headset and the Galaxy Ring 2 at the same event. Pre-reservations are open, offering customers benefits worth Rs 5,000.

articles.title: Aldi Air Fryer Dupe Flies Off Shelves at €49.99
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Aldi is launching two new Ambiano Air Fryer models: a 6.2L version priced at €49.99 and a 3.3L compact version for €34.99. The 6.2L model features a sync function and eight preset programs, while the 3.3L model offers an easy-to-read display and one-touch cooking, with both using significantly less fat than traditional fryers.

articles.title: Largest Ever, 4500mAh in A POD with a Huge Screen-VOOPOO VINCI E120
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: VOOPOO announced the launch of its new product, the VOOPOO VINCI E120. The device features huge power, huge flavor, and a huge display within a pocketable design. The company aims to redefine user experience with this new device.

articles.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new OnePlus 13 smartphone and a special variant of the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 at its winter launch event on January 7.

articles.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates: OnePlus set to unveil much-awaited flagship series
articles.author: Tech Desk
org: IE Online Media Services Pvt Ltd
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones, along with a special variant of the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 at its Winter Launch event on January 7, 2025. The OnePlus 13 is priced starting at Rs 69,999, while the OnePlus 13R starts at Rs 42,999. The OnePlus Buds Pro 3 are available for Rs 11,999, with open sales starting on January 10 for the OnePlus 13 and January 13 for the OnePlus 13R.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy S series smartphones with advanced AI in US
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil its new Galaxy S series smartphones with advanced AI features at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose on January 22nd. The event is themed 'The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences' and is expected to feature the Galaxy S25, including a new slim model with the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series.

articles.title: How an AI Social Media Responder Can Save Your Small Business (and Your Sanity)
articles.author: Elisabeta Qoku
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of AI-powered social media responders for small businesses. This service offers features such as 24/7 customer support, consistent brand voice, personalized responses, and the ability to handle increased customer traffic. It also provides valuable insights through analytics, resulting in improved customer engagement and a better work-life balance for business owners.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung Galaxy S25 series arriving on January 22
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose. The event will also introduce One UI 7 and new Galaxy AI experiences. Customers can pre-reserve the Galaxy S25 series for Rs 1,999 to receive benefits.

articles.title: ASUS ROG Unveils Latest Innovations Forged to Unlock Limitless Gaming Potential at CES 2025
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: ASUS Republic of Gamers (ROG) unveiled a new lineup of gaming technology at CES 2025. This includes Zephyrus series, Flow Z13, XG Mobile featuring latest Intel or AMD processors, with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series Laptop GPUs, and new Strix Scar and Strix G laptop series combine NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series Laptop GPUs, Intel ® Core ™ Ultra 9 processor 275HX processor. ROG G700 series delivers powerful tower gaming performance.

articles.title: WATCH: Legacy vs Burkburnett girls high school soccer highlights
articles.author: M.J. Baird
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new menu to warm up customers during the winter.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Launch Confirmed, Coming With Advanced Galaxy AI Features at Galaxy Unpacked Event on January 22, 2025; Check Details
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is set to unveil its Galaxy S25 series smartphones at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose, California. The new series will feature advanced AI capabilities and includes a new slim model with the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series. The company aims to boost sales of its new foldable smartphones with advanced AI, with plans to add on-device Galaxy AI to 200 million Galaxy devices.

articles.title: Samsung to launch new galaxy smartphones with advanced AI in US this month
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host its Galaxy Unpacked event in the United States this month, where the company is expected to introduce its new Galaxy S series smartphones featuring advanced AI capabilities. The event, themed "The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences," will take place on January 22 in San Jose, California, and is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 flagship smartphones, including a new slim model.

articles.title: This HD folding projector fits in your pocket
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Aurzen has introduced the ZIP, a new portable tri-fold projector. The ZIP's design allows it to be small enough to fit in a pocket.

articles.title: New LG TVs will be able to play Xbox games, no console required
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching its Xbox app on new LG smart TVs later this year. This expands the availability of Xbox gaming services to LG smart TV users.

articles.title: 'Fantastic' Shark cleaner that leaves carpet 'looking brand-new' £70 off
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Shark is offering the CarpetXpert Deep Carpet Cleaner at a reduced price of £179.99, and the CarpetXpert Deep Clean Pro Formula is available for £10.99. Vax has the Rapid Power Revive Carpet Cleaner on offer for £130. Russell Hobbs offers the Upright Carpet Cleaner for £79.99.

articles.title: AMD's Ryzen AI Max is a one-of-a-kind graphics and AI powerhouse
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: AMD launched the Ryzen AI Max and AI Max+ processors at CES 2025, positioning them as hybrid chips for graphics and AI workstations. These processors offer significant graphics and AI performance, rivaling Nvidia's GeForce 4090 GPU. AMD will offer consumer and Pro versions of the Ryzen AI Max, with design wins including HP and Asus products.

articles.title: Dreame's latest pool cleaner can detect the shape of your pool
articles.author: James Barber
articles.summary: Dreame is launching the Z1 Pro robotic pool cleaner featuring PoolSense technology, which intelligently recognizes pool shapes and adjusts cleaning strategies. The Z1 Pro also boasts 8,000 GPH suction power, dual brush technology, and a LiFi Control System for precise cleaning control.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launching on this date, Galaxy Unpacked 2025 date announced
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its new Galaxy S25 series at the Unpacked 2025 event on January 22, 2025, along with the OneUI 7 update featuring Galaxy AI. The company may also introduce the Galaxy Ring 2 with enhanced health monitoring capabilities. The Galaxy S25 series will consist of the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, and Galaxy S25 Ultra models.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 announced for January 22: Expected processor, display and other features
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Samsung Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025, in San Jose, US. The series will include the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra. Pre-reservations for the series have begun in India.

articles.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Launch In India Today: Price, Specs, How To Watch LIVE
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13 series and the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 at the 'Winter Launch Event'. The OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 6,000mAh battery, and a Hasselblad-powered triple 50MP camera system, while the OnePlus 13R has a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor and a 50MP telephoto lens. The expected price for OnePlus Buds Pro 3 is Rs 13,999 in India.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 India Launch: Event Timings, Where To Watch And More
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the new 13R model in India. The company will also debut a new variant of the Buds 3 Pro earbuds.

articles.title: Best eco-friendly beauty products made with a just-add-water method
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Skipper, an Australian home and body care brand, has launched innovative tablet-based products to reduce plastic waste, including Body Wash, Universal Cleaner, and Face Wash. Their revamped laundry sheets are now 50 percent larger with fresh scents and stain-fighting enzymes. The product line also includes Hand Wash, Laundry Detergent Sheets, Dishwasher Tablets and Toilet Blocks.

articles.title: Samsung to reveal AI-enhanced Galaxy S series at Unpacked
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the next generation Galaxy S series during the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 23, 2025, in San Jose, California. The new Galaxy S series aims to introduce more intuitive AI capabilities, enhancing everyday experiences for users. Samsung is offering an e-voucher of up to ₱5,000 for those who register for the event.

articles.title: Sony's Xyn is a prototype VR headset for making 3D games and movies
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Sony is launching the Xyn, an 'extended reality' headset designed for creating 3D objects, featuring 4K OLED displays and support for third-party software. Alongside the headset, Sony revealed Xyn Motion Studio, a Windows app for motion-tracking. They are also developing a prototype 'spatial capture solution' to transform real-world images into 3D assets.

articles.title: Launch of XYN™, an integrated software and hardware solution designed to support the creation of spatial content
articles.author: Sony Corporation
articles.summary: XYN™ launched an integrated software and hardware solution. The solution supports the creation of spatial content.

articles.title: Samsung to hold unpack event for new Galaxy smartphone in US this month
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil "The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences" at the Galaxy Unpacked event in the United States this month. The company officials made the announcement on Tuesday.

articles.title: Samsung's next Galaxy Unpacked event slated for January, promises new S-series reveal
articles.author: Victor Barreiro Jr.
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing a Galaxy Unpacked event scheduled for January 22 in San Jose, California. The event promises additions to its AI-powered offerings for Samsung devices in the upcoming Galaxy S series. The event will be streamed live on Samsung.com, Samsung Newsroom, and Samsung's YouTube channel.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch date revealed: what to expect from Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Samsung will hold its Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose, where it is expected to reveal the Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, S25 Ultra) and debut new Galaxy AI features. Pre-reservations for the Galaxy S25 lineup have begun in India, offering benefits to customers.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy smartphone at US unpacked event this month
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host its Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose, California, on January 22, unveiling the new Galaxy S25 series smartphones. The event will showcase advanced artificial intelligence (AI) features and a new slim model with the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series. The event will be livestreamed on YouTube and the company's website.

articles.title: Samsung and LG Showcase AI-Powered TVs at CES 2025, Elevating Personalized Viewing Experiences
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Samsung and LG introduced new AI-powered TVs at CES 2025. Samsung unveiled its 'Vision AI' technology integrated into Neo QLED TVs, including a 115-inch model with real-time language translation. LG showcased its 2025 OLED Evo TVs, enhanced with the webOS25 platform and the Alpha 11 AI processor, featuring improved picture and sound quality along with personalized user experiences.

articles.title: Nolah Evolution Mattress, Editor Reviewed and Tested 2025
articles.author: Jordi Lippe-Mc Graw
articles.summary: The Nolah Evolution mattress is presented as a high-end option, particularly suitable for side sleepers, with features like a plush Euro topper, Zoned AirFoam HD, and targeted coil support. It aims to provide luxurious comfort and advanced support, addressing issues like back pain and overheating with its cooling ArcticTex cover and hybrid construction for motion isolation.

articles.title: Samsung announces Galaxy Unpacked for January 22 for S25
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to host Galaxy Unpacked on January 22nd, where the Galaxy S25 series is expected to be unveiled along with potentially other innovations. The event will highlight 'Galaxy AI', indicating that AI will be a central component, with possible advancements in camera features, car crash detection, and wearable integrations such as a successor to the Galaxy Ring. The livestream of Galaxy Unpacked will be available on Samsung.com and YouTube.

articles.title: Hot off the Heels of a Next-Gen Xbox Rumor, Microsoft Announces Your LG Smart TV Is Now an Xbox
articles.summary: Microsoft's Xbox Cloud Gaming service expanded to Samsung Smart TVs in 2024 and is coming soon to LG Smart TVs, allowing customers to access Xbox games without a console. The service is also accessible through a dedicated Game Pass app on Meta Quest.

articles.title: Council Post: Tech-Based Developments With Big Implications For Product Businesses
articles.summary: Turing Labs Inc. suggests AI will flip the product development model, with consumers becoming creators. ViralGains highlights GenAI's impact on product innovation and process improvement. Consultadd Inc. notes the importance of SEO for AI-driven search engines. Amazon focuses on AI optimizing product development with better forecasting.  Ambi Robotics discusses AI agents automating tasks. Tastry focuses on AI-driven predictive analytics optimizing R&D and streamlining supply chains. Algolia focuses on AI-driven insights by tracking consumer behavior and preferences at every stage of the shopping journey. EncompaaS highlights AI-powered intelligent document processing providing pharmaceutical manufacturers with insights into a drug's life cycle.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series launch: Date, features, details of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung will host a Galaxy Unpacked event later this month to unveil the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra. The new devices promise to change how Galaxy users interact with the world, showcasing specs, features, and upgrades.

articles.title: Srixon rolls out 9th generation of Z-STAR golf balls
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: SRIXON is launching its latest line of Z-STAR Series golf balls. These golf balls are available at retail.

articles.title: Sony's XYN is a tool — and XR headset — for making the metaverse
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Sony launched XYN, an integrated software and hardware solution designed for spatial content creation.

articles.title: Zepp Clarity Introduces "Try Before You Buy" OTC Hearing Aids Program at CES 2025, Empowering ...
articles.author: Colorado Springs Gazette
articles.summary: Zepp is launching Zepp Clarity, a smart service that features a "Try Before You Buy" program. This allows customers to test the product before committing to a purchase.

articles.title: Crazy Displays: Lenovo Shows Off Dual-Screen Yoga Book and Rollable ThinkBook
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Lenovo introduces the Yoga Slim 9i, featuring a unique design where the webcam is hidden under the display.

articles.title: I Watched a Printer-Sized Gadget Add More Battery Life to a Phone in Seconds
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Swippitt introduces a product that inserts a freshly charged battery into a phone's case when needed. This feature provides an on-demand power solution for mobile devices.

articles.title: Native GeForce Now App Coming to Steam Deck Later This Year
articles.author: Tech Raptor
articles.summary: Nvidia is releasing a native GeForce Now app for Steam Deck later this year. This eliminates the need for workarounds when using GeForce Now on the Steam Deck.

articles.title: Next Generation in Plant-Based Protein & Infant Nutrition
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Axiom Foods has launched Oryzatein® 2.0 Rice Protein, a plant-based protein designed for infant foods and beverages that is grit-free and has extra low-heavy metal content.

articles.title: This Lenovo Yoga Laptop Hides The Webcam Under Its Screen
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lenovo Yoga Slim 9i features an under-display camera. This camera helps minimize bezels and offers an immersive experience.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Ring 2: All the latest rumors
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Samsung might unveil the Galaxy Ring 2 at an upcoming Unpacked event. This suggests a potential introduction or launch of a new product within the Samsung Galaxy lineup.

articles.title: Wild Displays: Lenovo Shows Off Dual-Screen Yoga Book and Rollable ThinkBook
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Lenovo's new Yoga Slim 9i features a webcam hidden under the display.

articles.title: Are the New Balance Snoafers Hideous or Genius?
articles.author: New York Times
articles.summary: New Balance is in conversation about their new product 'Snoafers,' which is a cross between sneakers and loafers.

articles.title: Nvidia unveils 'Cosmos' models, new chips, Toyota deal at CES 2025
articles.author: Daily Sabah
articles.summary: Nvidia launched new products at a technology conference, introducing artificial intelligence to train robots and cars. These new offerings aim to improve the capabilities of robots and autonomous vehicles.

articles.title: Sony unveils prototype VR headset Xyn for "creating 3D objects for films, animation, and games"
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Sony is launching Xyn, a new "extended reality" headset.

articles.title: Nvidia unveils GeForce RTX 50 Series graphics cards with big performance gains
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the Nvidia GeForce RTX 5000 series GPUs. These GPUs are based on the Blackwell RTX technology.

articles.title: Nvidia's new GPU series led an avalanche of entertainment-related announcements at CES
articles.author: Citrus County Chronicle
articles.summary: Nvidia has unveiled its GeForce RTX 50 Series desktop and laptop GPUs.

articles.title: Anker announced a power bank at CES 2025 unlike any I've seen before
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Anker introduced a new power bank.

articles.title: Pattern Hair Steamer Review: An Effective Tool For Hydrating Curls
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Pattern introduced the Hair Steamer. The Hair Steamer optimizes hydration and encourages better absorption of haircare products.

articles.title: MSI's new Titan 18 HX laptop loves dragons, dragons, dragons
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: MSI has launched a new gaming laptop with a distinct design featuring dragons. The laptop's aesthetic moves away from typical boardroom styles.

articles.title: A Guide to Comfortable Adult Diapers
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Newclears offers diapers with various sizes and designs for different body shapes. Their diapers feature 3D leg circumferences and elastic waistbands for a secure and comfortable fit, preventing leaks.

articles.title: Embrace the next generation of Vlogging and Storytelling with Infinix ZERO Flip
articles.author: Urdu Point
articles.summary: Infinix, a smartphone brand, has launched its new flagship phone, the Infinix ZERO Flip, targeting creative individuals and adventurers. The phone aims to empower youth through the latest technology.

articles.title: Kiwi-bound plug-in hybrid from China detailed
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: Leapmotor is introducing a new plug-in vehicle to the New Zealand market. This new vehicle is designed to compete with the Mitsubishi Outlander.

articles.title: Samsung to launch new Galaxy smartphones with advanced AI in US this month
articles.author: Team Indulge Ians
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil its Galaxy S25 smartphones with advanced AI at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22 in San Jose. The event will focus on "The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences". Samsung also aims to increase sales of its foldable smartphones by over 10%, emphasizing enhanced AI capabilities.
